JobFullDesc: At Xbox, we believe in our mission of reaching over 2 billion gamers worldwide.  Gaming today brings people from all walks of life and geographies together—centering them around the thing they love most—GAMES! Our teamThe Gaming Publisher Experience (GPX) org is responsible for helping gamers discover and acquire digital game content, as well as ensuring that developers and publishers have low friction access to our ecosystem. We work closely with partner teams across Xbox, as well as both internal and external game studios.  We’re always striving to find new and innovative ways of incorporating the latest in design patterns, cloud tech, and machine learning to create better experiences – all the while, maintaining very high availability services and ensuring the safety and security of our customers’ data.  #GEOJobs#gamingjobsResponsibilitiesWhy you should join us This is a great opportunity to join  GPX org and participate in building the next version of UI and services that enhance Publisher experience and Gamer experience on various game stores and touches millions of Xbox gamers across the globe.  You will be responsible for designing and implementing micro-services to build new gaming product catalog,  serve product information to millions of requests every day and improve our personalization efforts. You will also contribute by building new features to the existing system, debugging/troubleshooting, drive analysis of issues and outages and improve production through monitoring, reporting and recovery tools.QualificationsPreferred Qualifications:A BS/MS in Computer Science or  3+ years software development experienceWorking knowledge of cloud platforms like Azure, AWSGreat design,  problem-solving and debugging skillsGood verbal and written communication skillsAbility to work well in a diverse, team-focused environment.Aspire to be grow as a person, as a teammate, and as an engineer.Believe that a team working well together is truly smarter than the single smartest person on that team. Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer.
